## Bio

I am a physics student at Heidelberg University and am particulary interested in environmental physics and climate science, as well as ecological living. I am currently doing my master’s project in the climate attribution group.

## Research Interests

My work at Leipzig University focuses on the variability of heatwave warming under rising greenhouse gas concentrations and on understanding the underlying physical processes. To this end, I analyse nudged circulation simulations of global climate models.
